channel.title: The Daily Pratchett
channel.description: A quote from Sir Terry Pratchett every day.

item.title: 15-May-16
item.description:
""Actors," said Granny, witheringly. "As if the world weren't full of enough history without inventing more.""

- Terry Pratchett, Wyrd Sisters

item.title: 14-May-16
item.description:
""Luck is my middle name," said Rincewind, indistinctly. "Mind you, my first name is Bad.""

- Terry Pratchett, Interesting Times

item.title: 13-May-16
item.description:
"Of course, it is very important to be sober when you take an exam. Many worthwhile careers in the street-cleansing, fruit-picking and subway-guitar-playing industries have been founded on a lack of understanding of this simple fact."

- Terry Pratchett, Moving Pictures

item.title: 12-May-16
item.description:
"I believe it's very hard to have fun in Iceland without fish being involved in some way."

Looking for a good place to party - Terry Pratchett, Johnny and the Dead

item.title: 11-May-16
item.description:
"How's he in the mysterious senses department?"

Gaspode the wonder dog - Terry Pratchett, Moving Pictures
